title: Gleaming in the Snow (3U89)
text:
Set:	Realms of the Elf-lords
Kind:	Shadow
Culture:	Sauron
Twilight:	0
Card Type:	Event
Game Text:	Regroup: Exert a [Sauron] Orc and spot a [Gondor] companion to add a burden.
Lore:	”'A Ring of Power looks after itself…. It may slip off treacherously, but its keeper never abandons it.'”
Rarity:	U
